project_abstract.cdata: The First Highway Maintenance Project will comprise: (i) the reorganization and strengthening of maintenance operations including the training of maintenance personnel at all levels (ii) the purchase of maintenance equipment, spare parts, fuel and materials (iii) the construction and equipping of maintenance workshop facilities (iv) the improvement of routine and periodic maintenance operations over the 2,200 km national road network and (v) the betterment of selected roads and the elimination of a backlog of deferred maintenance on about 600 km of the above roads.
